title: Teaching Experience
text:
Teaching Assistant, Machine Learning
Helping the professor in course logistics, creating assignments and evaluation.
Teaching Assistant, Probability and Random Processes
Conducted discussion sessions and drafted tutorial solutions. Created and evaluated assignments based on Computer Vision and Image Processing.
Peer Assisted Learning Mentor
Mentored freshmen students, and coached them in English to help them ease into campus life.
Certification in Teaching
Completed 6-week long program engaging in practice modules and seminars aimed at developing and enhancing teaching skills.

title: Eshan Gujarathi
text:
I am a senior undergraduate majoring in Computer Science and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar. I am a creative, diligent, and result-oriented individual who always looks for new opportunities to grow.
My research interests include Applied Machine Learning, Bayesian Learning, Computer Vision, and Data Science. I am passionate about applying Artificial Intelligence to critical applications with a broader impact.
